text: Georgios Kaminis (born 15 July 1954) is a Greek-American politician. He was the Mayor of Athens from 2011 until 2019. Giorgos Kaminis was born in New York City. He holds both Greek and American citizenship. At the age of five he left New York and moved to Athens. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Athens Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:Greek lawyers
title: Giorgos Kaminis
